name: Cubescape
description:
This game, Cubescape, by AbelMinar is created for fun and is free of charge.

NO ADS !

Free Game To Play and 15 MB ONLY!

Made after long hours of work. A game created on Unity by a one-man game maker, AbelMinar.

EASY TO PLAY!

Made on Windows, should be compatible with Windows / Mac

Easy to follow download instructions!

Youtube Video Footage available soon! 

Controls:  A / D | Left or Right Arrow Keys
